altername_name: New Super Mario Bros. 5: Tag Team of the Clones 2
name: New Super Mario Bros. 5: Clone Tag Team 2
overview: New Super Mario Bros. 5: Clone Tag Team 2 is the direct sequel to MarioFanatic64's New Super Mario Bros. 5: Clone Tag Team. It builds upon ideas and themes from the original New Super Mario Bros. 5: Clone Tag Team but introduces new concepts, puzzles and experiments on the Clone gameplay.
